t: Psalm 94
The Lord Implored to Avenge His People.
O*pn Lord,*s God of vengeance, God*ln of vengeance, shine forth!
Rise*ln up, O Judge of the earth, Render*ln recompense to the proud.
How*ln long shall the wicked, O Lord,*s How*ln long shall the wicked exult?
They*ln pour forth words,*i they speak arrogantly; All*ln who do wickedness vaunt themselves.
They*ln crush Your people, O Lord,*s And*ln afflict Your heritage.
They*ln slay the widow and the stranger And*ln murder the orphans.
They*ln have said, “The Lord*s does not see, Nor*ln does the God of Jacob pay heed.”
Pay*ln heed, you senseless among the people; And*ln when will you understand, stupid ones?
He*ln who planted the ear, does He not hear? He*ln who formed the eye, does He not see?
He*ln who chastens the nations, will He not rebuke, Even*iln He who teaches man knowledge?
The*ln Lord*s knows the thoughts of man, That*ln they are a mere*i breath.
Blessed*ln is the man whom You chasten, O Lord,*s And*ln whom You teach out of Your law;
That*ln You may grant him relief from the days of adversity, Until*ln a pit is dug for the wicked.
For*ln the Lord*s will not abandon His people, Nor*ln will He forsake His inheritance.
For*ln judgment will again be righteous, And*ln all the upright in heart will follow it.
Who*ln will stand up for me against evildoers? Who*ln will take his stand for me against those who do wickedness?
If*ln the Lord*s had not been my help, My*ln soul would soon have dwelt in the*i abode*i of*i silence.
If*ln I should say, “My foot has slipped,” Your*ln lovingkindness, O Lord,*s will hold me up.
When*ln my anxious thoughts multiply within me, Your*ln consolations delight my soul.
Can*ln a throne of destruction be allied with You, One*ln which devises mischief by decree?
They*ln band themselves together against the life of the righteous And*ln condemn the innocent to death.
But*ln the Lord*s has been my stronghold, And*ln my God the rock of my refuge.
He*ln has brought back their wickedness upon them And*ln will destroy them in their evil; The*ln Lord*s our God will destroy them.
